subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Noah Syndergaard delivered missiles that hit 98, 97, 99 miles per hour on Saturday. But the Yankees set upon him like wolves on carrion, going on to win the game, 5-0.
snippet: Noah Syndergaard delivered missiles that hit 98, 97, 99 miles per hour on Saturday. But the Yankees set upon him like wolves on carrion, going on to win the game, 5-0.
